name: Fit the Fat
description:
Want to get rid of your fat?? Simply jump the rope and dance the hula hula!

Master your skills in this fun new game and help this fat guy and his girlfriend lose weight by jumping the rope and dance the hula.

Fit the Fat is very simple: tap to jump or dance. You will get fit and the rope and hula will get fast.

What users say?

"Fit the Fat is so addictive!"
"Tough but fun."

Better than Flappy Bird, better that Piano Titles, better than The Line.

WARNING: this game is highly addictive and almost impossible. We dare you to reach the ideal weight!
